shibboleth.model

Class CountGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.model.CountGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GithubGraph

    public class CountGraph
extends Object
implements GithubGraph
    A GrihubGraph which does nothing else than counting how many users, repos and contributions have been added.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

      • remove

        public boolean remove(String nodeName)
        Description copied from interface: GithubGraph
        Remove node with the given node name. Removes neighbors of the given node if their degree will become equal to 0; Generally speaking the node name is either a Github user name or a Github repo name.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface GithubGraph
        Returns:
        Whether a node was indeed removed from the graph.
